name: Blue Cove Ventures
overview:
Blue Cove Ventures invests in innovation focusing on early stage opportunities. They love web, mobile and software opportunities and invest in entrepreneurs who have great, commercially viable ideas with significant global potential. They like entrepreneurs with passion and persistence who go that extra mile to get the job done.

In return you can expect Blue Cove to be a committed partner intimately involved with making your vision a commercial reality. For them to meet you every week they back companies in Sydney and Canberra â€“ proximity matters!

You can rely on them to assist with government grant applications, additional fund raising and introductions to potential partners.

They are looking for positive outcomes from their investments and expect to monetize their investments through trade sales.

funding_round.source_description: Simmersion Holdings Gets $1.9M Investment from Blue Cove Ventures
